headline: Creative Director and Archetypal Mosaic podcast host (2015-present)
summary:
Tank is a BMI author and publisher, with some of his works being released through The Orchard, a SONY Entertainment Distributor. One of his audio works garnered the Guinness World Record in 2011. His best original audio work is titled, Time is Different When We Sleep.

His book releases have been plentiful with a large catalogue available via Kindle, Amazon, some libraries, and bookstores. His was the first and original publication of King Solomon's The Testament of King Solomon, several children's books (including one about his beloved Grand-Mother, Sophia), several poetry anthologies, and additionally - writings in the fields of psychology, philosophy, magic, horror, and high fiction. His most recent hardcover additions - are four memoirs about Japan.

Tank's Archetypal Mosaic podcast has featured extraordinary guests, first via LA's top 5 station KPFK, and later via Spotify and iHeart Radio. Some notable guests include Archduke Géza von Habsburg, Tatiana Fabergé, the late Jane McAdam Freud, beloved psychologist David Burns, Jungian Professor Sonu Shamdasani, Yale Professor Craig Wright, and many additional enlightening guests.

As an actor, Tank was lucky to win an audition to perform with Hollywood royal - Isabella Rossellini in a co-starring role on the top ABC Television hit, Alias. He also performed on FOX' 24, as the devil in the Italian film, Full Moon, is under an agreement with horror super author Stephen King on three directorial 'Dollar Baby' projects, and released a multitude of original music videos and fourteen short films, some of which were shown at various film festivals, including the Oldenburg in Germany and JLTV. One was also shown at a special screening in West Hollywood, CA, garnering Mikhail an additional commendation from the Mayor after having received the first from the Mayor of Hollywood for an original Darksoul Theatre show, in 2008.

Tank is also a winner of SCORE's prestigious Entrepreneur Award, handed to him at an elegant ceremony in West Los Angeles. He presented an original Jungian psychological lecture in Sicily, taught in Japan and currently practices magatama collecting, historical majick, and multi-media art.

In 2023, Tank started Magatama AI, focusing on Humanistic and Artistic AI as well as AEI, an original concept of Artificial Emotional Intelligence (MagatamaAI.com / logo by Japanese artist, Y.I.); successfully completed the 2023 Summer Techstars Venture Deals VC Course; and is in process of taking the impactful DeepLearning AI, AI for Good Specialization certified course with instructor, Robert Monarch.

experiences.title: Creative Director
experiences.description:
• Successfully completed the 2023 Summer Techstars Venture Deals VC Course (by invitation) 
• Invited to and enjoyed the Masters of Scale Strategy Session, in alliance with Capital One Business: Powered by AI, Masterminded by You, featuring TechStars CEO Maëlle Gave
• Completed the impactful DeepLearning AI, AI for Good / Public Health certified course with instructor, Robert Monarch
• Humanistic and Artistic AI as well as AEI, an original concept of Artificial Emotional Intelligence
• Wrote and published four original hardcover books in and about Japan, available via Amazon. The
titles are: Magic Summer in Japan, Magic Winter in Japan, Reflections of the Psyche, and The Lore of
Magatama
• Co-created a Live Show with Classical Japanese Artist, Rena Kato. Performed one of a kind show in
Japan
• Interviewed Shinto Priest Hiroyuki Nakamura about the world-famous fertility festival, Kanamara-
Matsuri
• Worked with top grade recording studio, Onkio Haus (in Ginza) on five world wide audio-released
projects
• Recorded a radio episode with 12th generation Imperial Silversmith, Sohaku Kamikawa of Nisshin
Kikinzoku
• Invited to a creative and collaborative meeting with high end major book and story publisher, Gakken
• Crafted, created and taught about a unique perspective, regarding Japanese mythology, travel and
culture

experiences.title: Consultant
experiences.description:
• Provided valuable paid feedback to various brands, including auto-manufacturing, pharmaceuticals, as well as foods & beverages in regards to the best branding practices.
• Assisted in choosing and deciding on the best means of marketing and promoting products and what would sell to specific target groups.

experiences.title: Newsletter Manager / Executive Assistant
experiences.description:
Provided content guidance and direction, as chief principal editor for CIO newsletter. 
Interviewed executives and officers for published work in newsletters and other communications. Collaborated with senior leadership and counsel to provide current relevant news and information to readers. Collaborated with president and CEO of the Studio performing assigned tasks and actions as required.

Key Results:
• Partnered with VP of public relations to deliver consistent internal announcements within the studio.
• Helped negotiate savings in excess of $120,000 annually as an SRM Expert.

experiences.title: Actor / Associate Producer
experiences.description:
• Became a SAG-AFTRA member 
• Won several high profile auditions, co-starred on ABC”s Show, ‘ALIAS’ (speaking), FOX’s 24 (ongoing henchman role), supporting role in Italian film, ‘Full Moon’ and additional multi-media projects. 
• Directed three official Stephen King Dollar Baby Films, which have screened at multiple international film festivals and have been included in several industry books.

experiences.title: Podcast Author and Host
experiences.description:
• Secured and interviewed legendary guests, including: robotics experts Dr. David Hanson and Dr.
David Levy; psychology experts, Dr. David M. Burns and Jane McAdam FREUD; dignitaries and royalty,
Archduke Géza von
Habsburg of Austria, Tatiana Fabergé and the late Grand Prince Romanov; and diverse cultural
influencers, including Harvard and Yale Professor Craig Wright, UC Berkeley Professor Daniel C.
Matt, R&B star Chanté Moore, Jung’s Red and Black Books Publisher and Editor, Professor Sonu
Shamdasani and others.
• Invited to present at the Goethe Nobel-Prize Winning University in Germany -- in the field of Jungian
psychology.
• Successfully presented at the exclusive Art and Psyche Jungian Conference, in Sicily, Italy — directly
to Jung’s living relatives.

experiences.title: KPFK Radio Host
experiences.description:
Research broad topics such as Jungian and Freudian Psychology, Robotics, Art, Multimedia. Personally invite and schedule interviews, worked directly with guests and representatives.

Key Result:
• Secured and Interviewed large-scale personnel, including: the late Grand Prince of Russia, Dimitri Romanov, heiress and historian of the Faberge eggs, Tatiana Fabergé, top anti-anxiety psychologist, David Burns, humanoid robotics creator, David Hanson, Michael Prince of the Principality of Sealand, and many more.
• Conducted meetings with radio station management, program and station directors, as well as sister companies.

education.degree_name: Teacher Of English To Speakers Of Other Languages (TEFL)
Successfully completed the 2023 summer VC course

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: CAS Systems Inc.: Excellence & High Standards
Guinness World Records: Creativity in Music
Los Angeles Mayor’s Office: Commendation in the Arts
